doc.title: Begegnung mit Werner Schroeter
doc.plot: German film, theatre and opera director Schroeter is a self-proclaimed "dinosaur from another age when people dreamed of ultimate freedom in film". Filmmaker Treut visits him on the set of his feature "DEUX" in Paris, and in Dusseldorf during the production of the opera "Norma". World premiere: FCMM October 2003. Screened at International Documentary Filmfestival Thessaloniki March 2004. Currently on the international filmfest circuit.
